long_description: The Mountainsmith Day TLS waistpack offers 854 cu. in. of spacious volume to carry your hiking, travel or school essentials-and then some! Breathable, tuck-away hipbelt and ergonomic lumbar pad offer a comfortable fit. Cavernous main compartment features bright yellow lining for increased visibility and a hanging organizer pocket. Interior padded sleeve holds a smart phone or MP3 player. Low profile, mesh side pockets are perfect for water bottles or other small items. Removable shoulder strap with 3 in. pad offers a comfortable carrying alternative; load leveler straps compress the load and enhance stability. Waistpack is compatible with Mountainsmith Strapettes (sold separately). The Mountainsmith Day TLS waistpack is made with recycled PET along with high-tenacity nylon in key wear areas.
short_description: The Mountainsmith Day TLS waistpack offers 854 cu. in. of spacious volume to carry your hiking, travel or school essentials-and then some!
